inclusion.criterion: Chronic functional tricuspid regurgitation (FTR) with annular diameter ≥ 40 mm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: New York Heart Association (NYHA) Class II-IVa
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic despite Guideline Directed Medical Therapy (GDMT); at minimum patient on diuretic regimen
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is willing and able to comply with all specified study evaluations
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The Local Site Heart Team concur that surgery will not be offered as a treatment option
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Transfemoral access of the Cardioband is determined to be feasible
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Aortic, mitral and/or pulmonic valve stenosis and/or regurgitation ≥ moderate
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe uncontrolled hypertension (Systolic BP ≥ 180 mmHg and/or Diastolic BP ≥ 110 mm
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome, severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, and is symptomatic. She remains lost to follow-up but is now prepared for surgery.
